body_html: Agreed, we do need something beyond trace comparison. As far as I can tell https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/autograd/gradcheck.py doesn't hit the autodiff in the JIT, though. What's the canonical way of doing this?
body_text: Agreed, we do need something beyond trace comparison. As far as I can tell https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/autograd/gradcheck.py doesn't hit the autodiff in the JIT, though. What's the canonical way of doing this?
body: Agreed, we do need something beyond trace comparison. As far as I can tell https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/autograd/gradcheck.py doesn't hit the autodiff in the JIT, though. What's the canonical way of doing this?
